item.title: Hacker News Top Stories: Friday, October 25, 2024 at 7:15 AM UTC
item.description:
1. Bitwarden SDK relicensed from proprietary to GPLv3 (421 points | 150 comments)
2. Cerebras Inference now 3x faster: Llama3.1-70B breaks 2,100 tokens/s (71 points | 33 comments)
3. Quantized Llama models with increased speed and a reduced memory footprint (352 points | 82 comments)
4. Florida Eases Licensing Requirements for Foreign Trained Doctors (59 points | 49 comments)
5. Italy declares its "web tax" applicable to any digital service worldwide (29 points | 19 comments)
6. OpenFeature – a vendor-agnostic, community-driven API for feature flagging (67 points | 14 comments)
7. A Primer on Vintage Cassette Decks: How to Find a Good One (19 points | 7 comments)
8. Launch HN: Skyvern (YC S23) – open-source AI agent for browser automations (265 points | 57 comments)
9. Rsbuild – A Better Vite? (49 points | 37 comments)
10. Why Safety Profiles Failed (143 points | 82 comments)
11. Never Missing the Train Again (228 points | 83 comments)
12. Security research on Private Cloud Compute (224 points | 74 comments)
13. Brush – A new compatible Gaussian splatting engine (118 points | 31 comments)
14. Vapi (YC W21) is hiring a founding infra engineer to handle scale ( | hide)
15. Post World War II Food (198 points | 155 comments)
16. Show HN: Rust based AWS Lambda Logs Viewer (TUI) (31 points | 9 comments)
17. Zigler: Zig NIFs in Elixir (170 points | 56 comments)
18. UnitedHealth says data of 100M stolen in Change Healthcare hack (48 points | 15 comments)
19. ST Book, the Notebook Atari ST (41 points | 13 comments)
20. Quit Social Media (2016) (83 points | 78 comments)
21. The brain's waste clearing lymphatic system shown in people for first time (54 points | 7 comments)
22. The Lion of St. Mark's Square in Venice Is Chinese (138 points | 40 comments)
23. Writer Underwriting Writer (7 points | 1 comment)
24. Lingo: A Go micro language framework for building Domain Specific Languages (80 points | 21 comments)
25. TLA from First Principles (30 points | 4 comments)
26. The Anvil Text Editor (110 points | 73 comments)
27. Show HN: TypeSchema – A JSON specification to describe data models (80 points | 35 comments)
28. The Script Creator (25 points | 1 comment)
29. When Samsung meets MediaTek: the story of a small bug chain [pdf] (34 points | 3 comments)
30. Data viz project that maps all earthquakes by magnitude (67 points | 14 comments)
